name: Meatball Sauce
recipeInstructions: 1. Put all the sauce ingredients into a blender and work to a puree. Transfer to a pan and season. Bring to the boil, stirring. Reduce the heat, cover and simmer, stiring occasionally while making the meatballs.
2. Place the beef in a bowl and combine it with the onion, garlic, herbs, breadcrumbs and egg. Season to taste. Knead for about 5 minutes until the meat is sticky. Shape into 50 meatballs.
3. Heat the oil in a nonstick frying pan and fry the meatballs in batches for 5-7 minutes until they are brown on all sides. Remove and place on kitchen paper to drain.
4. Add the meatballs to the sauce. Cover the pan and cook gently for 20 minutes. shaing the pan occasionally. Garnish with parsley sprigs.
